data.prompt:
Magic: The Gathering card art.

Final Prompt: Illustrate a pristine, mana-rich "Nebula Coral Sanctuary" within the Living Reef of Lumina, a breathtaking expanse of vibrant, bioluminescent cosmic coral forming intricate, Polynesian-inspired patterns. Green and blue mana currents visibly flow, nourishing a small, verdant island-world cradled within the nebula, where new life bursts forth in a vibrant display, providing a haven untouched by any encroaching darkness. Show small, glowing cosmic fish and delicate, ethereal flora thriving in this sanctuary.

Artist Credit: inspired by Jesper Ejsing

Style: Fantasy illustration, detailed, painterly, dramatic lighting.
Do NOT include any text, card frames, or UI elements.
Focus on the subject matter only.
